page.title: 09GOTHAM SCHOOL
page.content: There are two main buildings to our school.The older part was built in 1879 and we celebrated the school's centenary in 1979.The newer building is surrounded by a large playing field which overlooks the fields and woods on the outskirts of the village.There is a schoolhouse but it is no longer lived in by the headteacher. Most of the children who come to our school live in Gotham,but a few miles away there are the villages of Kingston-on-Soar,Thrumpton and Barton -in-Fabis.The children who live here also come to our school.They have to catch the school bus every morning and every afternoon.There are about 120 children in our school.
